name: Monuments of Mars
description:
When astronauts sent to explore mysterious structures on the surface of Mars disappear, NASA sends you to investigate. Collect incredible artifacts and fight deadly alien creatures as you wander through the Red Planet's unexplained wonders to solve ancient mysteries. 

You are the last hope. Can you explore the strange Martian structures and reveal their secrets? Can you survive to discover what happens to the men who manned the previous missions? 

* Survive the Red Planet: Over 20 levels filled with otherworldly hazards and enemies.
* Live Forever: Unlimited lives - never see a Game Over screen again!
* The Mystery of Mars: A mysterious and fascinating story.
* Total Recall: Game saves, high-score table and keyboard configuration.
* Controller Support: Partial Xbox 360 Controller support.
